text: @RealDeanCain Please, what a joke. Doctors, nurses & technicians all wear masks routinely for long procedure to save lives. If you can’t say anything positive to help medical workers by encouraging people to wear masks to prevent the transmission of COVID-19 during a global pandemic then STFU.
